segments.text: I ’ m in , let ’ s go !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , make a left here . . . no wait , I meant make a right . Come on , speed up !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t worry about it , just drive . Oh , no , the light is about to change . . . step on it !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you nuts ! I ’ m not going to run a red light !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Whatever . Just turn right here . . . . The freeway will be packed at this hour . . . . let ’ s take a side street.Go on ! Get out of our way ! Move , move !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ’ s your problem ! Geez . Having a fit is not going to help !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here , I know a short cut ... just go down here , and we ’ ll cut though Ashburn Heights . Let ’ s go , let ’ s go ! Watch out for that lady !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m going as fast as I can !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes ! We made it . 5:58 , just before the library closes .
segments.speaker: S1
